Nobody's saying that your characters have to be part of my RPG, if everythi=
ng goes well something big will happen to the Transformers...
  ----- Origi=
nal Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Monda=
y, October 02, 2000 1:36 PM
  Subject: Re: Attack...


  OOC: I think the R=
PG's were never linked, my bots will go back to Cybertron
  one day, and an=
other RPG will not stop them. Sorry...
  ----- Original Message -----
  Fro=
m: <minime_316@...>
  To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
  Sent: Monday, Octo=
ber 02, 2000 3:14 PM
  Subject: Re: Attack...


  > (I know that no one kno=
ws how the Pred gouvernement works. But what
  > I'm saying is that Dachand=
e made a link between the two RPG's, and
  > when that happens what happens=
 in one affects the other. In the Neo
  > Beast Machines, the Pred gouvernm=
ent is ruled by one King named
  > Archon. That has too affect the Neo Beas=
t Wars. I personally think
  > that Dachande should have made it a separte =
RPG, but that was his
  > decision. Thye only thin we can do is have everyo=
ne vote against it
  > and make Dachande re-start his RPG has a seperate en=
tity, or have
  > everyone follow what goes on in the NBM so that they can =
relate it in
  > the posts.)
  >
  > Starscream
  >
  > Starscream laughed.=

  >
  > "Thank You Zardus. The new breed of Predacons will not forget your=

  > generosity, and will pay you back once the Maximals and Megatron are
 =
 > out of the way."
  >
  > He turned to the Lavacons.
  >
  > "I am Starsc=
ream, former ruler of the Decepticons and member of the
  > newest faction =
of Predacons, commanded under KitKat. Please hold on
  > one minute while I=
 contact my group and than we will go."
  >
  > He sent a comm:
  >
  > "Ph=
obia, it's Starscream. Zardus isn't letting us take the
  > Oblitercons, bu=
t he's letting us use the Lavacons, a group that by
  > the looks of things=
 is stronger than the Oblitercons. We are about to
  > leave now, but we ne=
ed your co-ordinates."
  > ________________________________________________=
______________________
  > Vulois
  >
  > Vulois noticed that the firing ha=
d stopped. It was either they gave
  > up on firing or are entering the mou=
ntain. It would be foolish to do
  > so, but better think the foolish thing=
 when dealing with fools.
  >
  > "One of you three, stay in the back and w=
ipe away our tracks. When we
  > get to the main base their are 4 more warr=
iors waiting. We'll get
  > them and than attack this enemy."
  >
  > He ke=
pt walking.
  > ___________________________________________________________=
___________
  > Trainers
  >
  > Prebon frowned.
  >
  > "Too bad....I was =
hoping for you to tell me everything you knew about
  > your past life. It =
might help us know the secrets of our enemy
  > better." He saw Spears emer=
ge from the CR Chamber.
  >
  > "Spears! Great! Looks like we can take ever=
yone to battle after all.
  > I'd like you to meet Slayer, our new Trainer.=
 He is the protoform of
  > your friend...." Than Prebon eralized something=
. He needed to stop
  > talking about the past. Slayer did not have a chip,=
 meaning that even
  > though he was loyal now, the future could change. If=
 Slayer got
  > curious, he might sneak away to the Maximals. They would re=
veal his
  > old personality and when tell all Trainer secrets.
  >
  > "Ne=
ver mind who he is. No one will ever talk of the past again.
  > Understand=
? Good. Spears, I really have no mission right now. Soon we
  > will go int=
o battle. We will gang up on Ramulus and kill him. Right
  > now though, Sl=
ayer, come with me. I want you try on a War Suit that
  > will help you fig=
ht."
  >
  > Prebon started walking down to the cargo area.
  >
  >
  >
  >=
